pyntacle.algorithms.greedy_optimization_NEW module¶

class GreedyOptimization[source]¶

Bases: object

Greedy optimization algorithms for optimal kp-set calculation

kpp_neg_greedy(graph, kpp_size, kpp_type, seed=None, max_sp=None, implementation='pynatcle') -> (<class 'list'>, <class 'float'>)[source]¶

It iteratively searches for a kpp-set of a predefined vertex set size, removes it and measures the residual fragmentation score. The best kpp-set will be that that maximizes the fragmentation.

Parameters:
  • graph (igraph.Graph) – an igraph.Graph object. The graph should have specific properties. Please see the Minimum requirements specifications in pyntacle’s manual ciao sono AKKAPO
  • test (int) – test de prova
Returns:

intero de prova * ciccio2 (float): float de prova
Return type:

  • ciccio (int)
